name: Bus Booking System
description: A Django-based web application for bus ticket booking and management. This web application allows users to easily book and manage bus tickets online.

name: Weather App in React
description: Create a dynamic Weather App using React, allowing users to retrieve real-time weather data for any location.

name: Simple Calculator in Java
description: Java Swing Calculator: A user-friendly GUI calculator for basic arithmetic operations, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
